title: Digital Planner
description:
Carat is Hiring – Digital Planner (Full-time)

Carat, a global media agency, crafts digital strategies. We’re seeking a Digital Planner in Johannesburg to plan digital campaigns.

About the Role: You’ll develop digital media plans.

Key Responsibilities

  • Plan digital campaigns.
  • Analyze audience data.
  • Collaborate with teams for execution.
